channel.title: Ballscape 317 Join now!
channel.description:
Hey guys
this is the server ballscape!
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/rm8g2f.png[/img]
i'm posting this thread because i honestly believe that this server deserves loads more players then it has right now. we've got dedicated staff and an active community events and a real eco.
join us at : http://ballscape.com/ballscapeforums want to play instantly? : http://www.ballscapetr.com/play/
We've got everything you're looking for.
- all skills work besides construction - loads of bosses and customs - pking - an eco - loads of new items and some customs - we've got plenty of minigames - slayer shop and slayer points - a decent 300 xp rates - we actually have events once a week! *like double exp* i hope you guys join :)
Now i'll show you some pictures.
Home
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/1zgzvdd.jpg[/img]
bosses
Nex drops nex gear such as torva virtus and pernix
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/156ths3.jpg[/img]
saradomin boss drops the saradomin hilt godsword shards and the saradomin sword
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/jsityo.png[/img]
crazy psycho bitch she drops dragon claws and the spirit shields. [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/doxrb8.jpg[/img]
king of the caves
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/30a4d9y.jpg[/img]
some minigames
battlegrounds this is a minigame where you kill a unlimited amount of npc's for points once you run out of food you gotta exit through the gate and get the points. here you can get chaotics and vanguard
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/34i3712.jpg[/img]
barrows get your barrows gear here :D
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2ps2ams.jpg[/img]
barbarian assault here you can get plenty of items such as rune defender and fighter torso and ofcourse the fighter hat
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2wn8yn4.png[/img]
Monsters :
Glacors these fellows drop ganodermic gear.
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/e1q2v.jpg[/img]
ice strykewyrms these drop the staff of light which is pretty expensive ;o
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2ry1q85.jpg[/img]
Revenants we've got revenants and revs drop pvp gear such as vesta morrigan zurriel and Statius ^^
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/6xzy83.jpg[/img]
CATHERBY For all your skilling needs <3
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/5tw238.png[/img]
we've got LOADS of monsters minigames customs and bosses so join now!
Thank me later :D

item.description:
@garaman wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:2, topic:520644”]I find your lack of punctuation and grammar disturbing.

Also, no XP rate is stated.[/quote]
my grammar ain’t bad the thing is i wrote this down 2 hours ago and then i accidently clicked the site away.
so i had to write this all over again… and the xp rate is 300 i’m really sorry for not adding that.

Read full topic

item.title: Ballscape 317 Join now!
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:3, topic:520644”][quote author=Elrick link=topic=639143.msg4308208#msg4308208 date=1370294073]
I find your lack of punctuation and grammar disturbing.

Also, no XP rate is stated.
[/quote]
The xp rate does not necessarily need to be stated on the thread.[/quote]
No, but it should be. I like to know these things, and I’m sure I can’t be the only one who is curious. Would be a good thing to have stated in an advertisement.

Read full topic

Hey guys

i’m posting this thread because i honestly believe that this

we’ve got dedicated staff and an active community
events and a real eco.
